examples.example: 我们应该学会欣赏他人的优点和长处，这样才能共同进步。

translate.english: We should learn to appreciate the advantages and strengths of others, so that we can make progress together.

examples.example: 我们要学会欣赏大自然的美丽景色，感受生活的美好。

translate.english: We should learn to appreciate the beautiful scenery of nature and feel the beauty of life.

examples.example: 我们要懂得欣赏自己的努力成果，给自己更多的信心和动力。

translate.english: We should know how to appreciate the fruits of our own efforts and give ourselves more confidence and motivation.
